category.name: Interface.Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_UI_LOVComboBox_SizingBasedOn
preference.preference_description: Specifies parameter for the calculation of the threshold width for LOVComboBox objects in the Rich client. This preference value is only taken into account if the TC_UI_LOVComboBox_SizingPolicy preference is set to "FitToLength". Supported values are: - ScreenSize: The dimension of the primary monitor is used to determine the threshold width. - ParentSize: The dimension of the Rich client window is used to determine the threshold width. The default value for this user preference is "ScreenSize"
